description: Write fundamental unit for real quadratic field of discriminant n as x + y*omega; sequence gives values of x for n == 3 mod 4.
comments: Entries are indexed by values of n from A039957.
references: R. A. Mollin, Quadratics, CRC Press, 1996, Tables B1-B3.
mathematica: NumberFieldFundamentalUnits[ Sqrt[#] ][[1, 2, 1]] & /@ Select[Range[3, 195, 4], SquareFreeQ ] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 09 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 06 2000
